name: 江山如画
description:
Game features:

1. Mount system: mount can be displayed in battle after being equipped. Mounts can provide attribute bonuses.

2. The bonus system, called quench body in the game, needs to consume skill points as attribute points.

3. In the appointment and removal system, when upgrading the level of the protagonist, you can open a higher military position, appoint and remove the military position of the character, and you can increase a large number of attribute bonuses. Especially the force bonus.

4. Dream building system: after dream building, the main general will gain 10% bonus of the attributes of the deputy general, and have a chance to obtain the skills of the deputy general.

5. In the recruitment system, when the number of troops exceeds 10, they will automatically enter the recruitment office, and the increase or decrease of members can be implemented at the recruitment office.

6. In the system of recruiting talents, you can obtain the order of recruiting talents in the game. After use, you can obtain the generals with the corresponding arrows.

7. Build system, strengthen, inlay, make, etc.

8. The copy system will be automatically opened after reaching a certain level of scenario, and can be entered through the transmission point when transmitting the map.

9. In the harem system, when the protagonist obtains the harem character, he can obtain attribute bonus.

10. Array system: when the number of the team is 5, the array can be opened. The array can provide attribute bonus at different positions.

11. Prefix system: when acquiring equipment, it is possible to obtain a prefix.

12. The peripheral eye system can open the peripheral eye.

13. Refresh the system and refresh the world boss / Mount capture as time goes by.

14. In the tower brushing system, the soul calming tower will appear in the late stage. The boss will be refreshed in the tower, and will be refreshed after a period of time after killing.

15. Binding system, different character combinations can produce different effect bonus.
